TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_tademaw-ngazuy, title = tademaw-ngazuy, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/tademaw-ngazuy} }

S.FORM: == ngazuy == adada ku ngazuy nu maku. u ngazuy isasa' nu bihid, isasa' nu laway. anu mabalaki tu tademaw, mahepec ku ngazuy, u mabaki tu ku tademaw. u sulit nu zuma a kamu u sulit nu Hulam 頤 は, がある. u sulit nu Amlika The chin or the mental region is the area of the face below the lower lip and including the mandibular prominence. It is formed by the lower front of the mandible.

== ngazoy == adada ko ngazoy no mako. o ngazoy isasa' no bihid, isasa' no laway. ano mabalaki to tademaw, mahepec ko ngazoy, o mabaki to ko tademaw. o solit no zoma a kamo o solit no Holam 頤 は, がある. o solit no Amlika The chin or the mental region is the area of the face below the lower lip and incloding the mandibolar prominence. It is formed by the lower front of the mandible.
